originalText.text: COACH TYSON humiliated my son in front of his former teammates. HE STRIPPED MY SONS UNIFORM OFF OF HIS BACK AND TOLD HIM HE IS NO LONGER APART OF THE HARLEM JETS. My son was out for a few weeks because his great grandmother is in the hospital. COACH TYSON TOLD MY SON THATS NOT A GOOD ENOUGH EXCUSE AND KICKED HIM OFF OF THE TEAM

text.text: COACH TYSON humiliated my son in front of his former teammates. HE STRIPPED MY SONS UNIFORM OFF OF HIS BACK AND TOLD HIM HE IS NO LONGER APART OF THE HARLEM JETS. My son was out for a few weeks because his great grandmother is in the hospital. COACH TYSON TOLD MY SON THATS NOT A GOOD ENOUGH EXCUSE AND KICKED HIM OFF OF THE TEAM

originalText.text: So I signed my son up for football because he asked and loves sports. I was excited for him to play and possibly make friends. I spoke to the head coach, Jamel. I informed him that my son has ADHD and attends therapy. He stated well all of them do that is nothing we work with children like that. Well my son had an incident (nothing physical) with one of the older children, then another child was hitting my son hard, I encouraged him to inform the coach. My son did and was told that he keeps complaining and that this may not be the program for him. Eventually the coach decided that my son should not return. No my son never had any fights or did anything disruptive, except forget his cleats and football pants and for that they put him out of football. However, that is okay because this team is very unorganized, coaches do not show up at practice, they argue with the children, practice is all over the place and this is very messy. I am actually happy my son no longer plays for the messy jets. Hopefully the Jets.org is reading this.

originalText.text:
COACH TYSON called me over to him after practice and asked me why have I been out for 6 weeks
“ I TOLD HIM THAT I HAD A FAMILY EMERGENCY WITH MY GREAT GRANDMOTHER WHO IS CURRENTLY DYING IN THE HOSPITAL FROM COVID WHICH CAUSED ME TO BE OUT FOR A FEW WEEKS. HE TOLD ME “THATS AN EXCUSE” HE HUMILIATED ME AND TOLD ME TO TAKE OFF MY FOOTBALL EQUIPMENT IN FRONT OF ALL OF MY TEAMMATES. HE TOLD ME IM NOT PART OF THE TEAM ANYMORE AND WALKED AWAY. MY DREAM WAS TO BECOME A FOOTBALL PLAYER ONE DAY!!  I DONT EVER WANT TO PLAY FOOTBALL AGAIN.

originalText.text:
the energy of the coaches mixed with the kids drive and love for the game, leaves you with a sense of community and discipline a young man/women needs to excel in not only the game but life as well

ps. yes we have girls at the harlem jets that play the game!!!

originalText.text: Awesome program and will be soon looking to join the coaching ranks! Good job in the work that you do for the inner city youth and east coast football in general!
